mapper.select: select t3.avatar as avatar, t3.motto as motto, t3.nick_name as nickName, t2.username as username from ( select followed_uid from follow_relation where fans_id = #{uid} order by id desc limit #{from}, #{size} ) t1 left join `user` t2 on t1.followed_uid = t2.uid left join `user_ext` t3 on t1.followed_uid = t3.uid
